amendment.description: To provide that unexpended funds made available for improvements to Council Grove Lake, Kansas, may be used to make improvements to Richey Cove, Santa Fe Recreation Area, Canning Creek Recreation Area, and other areas in the State of Kansas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1952 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1952 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S13121-13122; text: CR S13121) To provide that unexpended funds made available for improvements to Council Grove Lake, Kansas, may be used to make improvements to Richey Cove, Santa Fe Recreation Area, Canning Creek Recreation Area, and other areas in the State of Kansas.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1952 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Roberts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1952 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
